abstract: Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Gen Martin E Dempsey, who is stepping down from his post on Oct 1, urges United Nations member states to increase their commitments to its global peacekeeping forces and expresses concern over wars and violent upheavals around the world.
lead_paragraph: The top American military commander urged United Nations member states on Tuesday to increase their commitments to its global peacekeeping forces.

headline.main: Top American Commander Warns U.N. That Too Few Carry Efforts for Peace
headline.print_headline: U.S. Warns That Too Few Carry Efforts for Peace

snippet: The top American military commander urged United Nations member states on Tuesday to increase their commitments to its global peacekeeping forces.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
